name: Little Space: Transmissions
description:
NANOGIRL MICRONAUTS HAVE BEEN DISPATCHED TO THE WORLDS BELOW. CONTACT IS SPORADIC AND FLEETING. PROLONGED SHRINKING SEEMS TO CAUSE PSYCHOLOGICAL EFFECT OF "SMALLNESS". ESTABLISH VISUAL TRANSMISSIONS TO RECEIVE DATA AND COMFORT THE GIRLS.

1,000,000,000 procedural worlds viewer. transmission frequencies can be copied and pasted, so you can revisit and share your favorite worlds.
